divs: Sighting DetailsI keep my dining room curtains open full from the point where the sun starts to set, until I go to bed so I can keep an eye on the night sky. I was walking past the window at 2101 (I had just looked at the clock), and saw a black helicopter chasing what appeared to be a red-orange orb. The orb was moving fast and erratically. It appeared to me moving in a somewhat straight direct path with some maneuvers mixed in such as moving quickly up, down, and around. (Like if a bouncy ball was trapped in a box) There was still enough day light to make out all the objects, and the mountain ranges. It looked to me as if it was playing "cat & mouse" with the chopper. As the chopper moved erratically (trying to chase it), they moved out of sight and that's when I noticed a HUGE black plane pacing the chopper. The whole event only lasted about 10 seconds. I grabbed my video camera as I ran out the front door, but by then, it was already in the tree line and I could not capture it on film. There was no wind, no clouds, or anything (except the trees) to interfere with this sighting. This is exactly what happened a couple weeks ago above my place but in that instance, the orb was green.
Summary: Another Orb Being Chased By Helicopter
